resources.string:
This is the app that the Fall 2022 VIP APPs Currency Detection Team built to help the user interact with the server and the algorithms we have loaded on it. The user can use the "Take a Picture" or "Load an Image" buttons to send an image to the server and the server will process the image. Then, the app will display whether the bill is Thai or Colombian, the denomination of the bill, and the conversion to USD.

Team Members:
Anvit Sinha
Daniel Choi
Joseph Lin
Sohee Kim
Katherine Sandys
Kavin Sathishkumar
Leng Lohanakakul
